root.description: OverviewPrime / Microcosm is a two game bundle featuring:Prime, a previously unreleased gameMicrocosm (main article)PrimePrime is a 2d side scrolling beat 'em up in the style of Final Fight that had originally been in development for the Super Nintendo. In its translation to it's ultimate release for the Sega CD, it underwent a significant overhaul of the fighting system in addition to the inclusion of developer interviews, 15 issues of the Prime comic book and a lengthy rock intro song whose quality has since been the subject to ridicule on the internet.
